artist: Artist: Ariel Bordeaux , et al.; Publisher: Fantagraphics Books, Seattle
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, title in upper right, with illustrations of women against a white background; a blonde woman is licking a lollipop in the forground; 48 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Spice Capades #1
